description:
Summary score from EQ-5D: a measure of health status from the EuroQol Group. This weighted index lies on a scale anchored by the values 1 for full health, and 0 for dead. EQ-5D values cannot take a value higher than 1, but values less than 0 are possible for health states considered to be worse than dead.[Rabin R, de Charro F. (PMID: 11491192)](10.3109/07853890109002087)

[Search for all EQ-5D variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/abc/variables?search=eq5d)
